Description: Outdoor Sales Executive - (Perfumes Sales Experience is a must)Skills
Skills: Following is the desired candidate profile:

Minimum of 3 years of experience in outdoor sales (perfumes), preferably in the UAE market.
Hold a valid driving license.
Good communication and language skills (preferably English and Arabic)
Ability to follow up receivables and maintain proper documentation with customers.
Must have perfume and fragrances selling experience.
Must have experience in the UAE market (perfume) and good active client base.
Ability to explore new market, engage customers and derive sales.
Have good understanding of market trends, customer profiling and terms negotiations.
Ability to meet sales targets.
Must have knowledge fragrances and market demands.
